name: ts-selector
description: A typescript implementation of Kubernetes Selectors

scripts.lint: npm run prettier:base -- --list-different && npm run lintSrc && npm run lintTest
scripts.lintFix: npm run prettier && npm run lintSrc -- --fix && npm run lintTest -- --fix
scripts.test: tsc && npm run testCode && npm run lint && ./bin/assert_no_file_modifications.sh
scripts.testFix: tsc && npm run testCode && npm run lintFix

author: Blend Labs, inc.
